= Functions to manage the time =

{{{
#include <time.h>
#include "btime.h"
}}}

==Calculate the time difference in nanoseconds==

{{{
    /**
     * @param stop last time 
     * @param start first time
     * @return the time in nanoseconds
     */
    extern int64_t timespecDiff(struct timespec *stop, struct timespec *start);
}}}

Usage:

{{{
   struct timespec start, stop;

   ...

   clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &start);

   ...

   clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &stop);
   printf("The total time was %lu nanosec\n", timespecDiff(&stop, &start));
}}}

==Calculate the time difference in seconds==

{{{
    /**
     * @param stop last time 
     * @param start first time
     * @return the time in seconds
     */
    extern int64_t timespecDiffSec(struct timespec *stop, struct timespec *start);
}}}

Usage:

{{{
   struct timespec start, stop;

   ...

   clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &start);

   ...

   clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &stop);
   printf("The total time was %lu sec\n", timespecDiffSec(&stop, &start));
}}}
